alias.conflict: This alias is already used by another realm.
alias.label: Alias

allowedUsernameCharacters.label: Allowed username characters
allowedUsernameCharacters.placeholder: Enter all the characters allowed for usernames (e.g.: abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyzABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ0123456789-._@+)

delete.confirm: Do you really want to delete the following realm?
delete.title: Delete realm

requireConfirmedAccount.help: By enabling this setting, a confirmed email address or phone number will be required for users to sign-in and manage their account.
requireConfirmedAccount.label: Require confirmed account

requireUniqueEmail.help: By enabling this setting, email address uniqueness will be enforced upon user creation & update.
requireUniqueEmail.label: Require unique email address

url.label: Application URL
url.placeholder: Enter the web address (URL) of the application corresponding to this realm
